title: New to riven, tip me!
body:
Hi all, you might have seen my recent posts about champs that i want to play and all the like, i recently got riven, she seems quite fun and spammy,  but just looking for some tips on how i should play her and build her? 
Im thinking my build should look something like this, sort of similar to a Renekton build...
{{item:3074}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3047}} or {{item:3111}} {{item:3742}}  depending on if ur fed or not etc maybe a {{item:3143}} or {{item:3142}} .
Im not sure really though, i know i can look on build guides, but i'd actually like some player to player advice on what works and what doesn't 
Also, what are bad matchups for riven? If i play a darius against Riven, i find i usually come out on top as well with Renekton but that could just depend on a skill matchup i suppose. Who counters Riven and who does RIven counter?
Thanks for taking the time to read, leave some advice, it would be duly appreciated!! ^_^

replies.body: Hello KawtYouNow! Riven main here! I would like to help you out :) with builds, I highly suggest always a bc first item. I don't care if you are 5-0 on your first back. It is essential to get a bc because of the armor pen and tankiness. Go for a hydra second and if you are vsing a tanky top then get lord dominics. Last 3 items are situational and how you want to play. I am an agressive Riven and like to make plays to win the game hence I need a one shot build which includes a deathstance or a bt and if you play defensive get a GA. Now in regards to playing her, I highly suggest you learn animation cancelling. It separates crap rivens from pro ones and also this is the only way in getting the most damage out of her. Watch some youtube videos on animation cancelling and watch BoxBox. He explains every matchup and what to do with her! Hope this helps :) if you need anything else, please ask :D

I do know only that her e cancels her ult but i am going to watch some videos on animation cancelling with riven. Thanks for your help, just a few questions, who does riven counter and who is riven countered by?

Not a problem :) just have a look at lolcounter if you want :D mainly ranged top laners beat Riven, for mele, darius, renekton, irelia and maokai those types of champs Riven has a hard time vsing. Just play safe and trade with those matchups and kindly ask your jgler for a gank :) hope that helps
cheerss man. THanks for your help.
Not a problem! Let me know if you need anything else! Goodluck :)

K, my build for Riven is {{item:3071}} then {{item:3158}} then {{item:3074}} {{item:3036}} {{item:3139}} {{item:3026}}  . You can replace merc and ga with items such as dead mans, maw or banshees. any-type of defensive item. If you are really fed you can get rid of merc if they don't have 'ANY' cc. or ga otherwise for another offensive item like {{item:3046}} . I do always s recommend getting 2 defense items though. It's just better for your survival if you get cc'ed or rooted. You can also swap out {{item:3036}} for {{item:3033}} if you are against a {{champion:50}} , {{champion:16}} or {{champion:420}} . Even {{champion:106}} if he is becoming a problem. If you are ahead in lane you can get a tiamat first back if you want for the extra combo damage. Hope this helps :D  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Thanks for that. IS there any animation cancelling with tiamat that i should know, i'd assume there is?

> [{quoted}](name=KawtYouNow,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=d8LUPsK0,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-10-11T21:59:20.122+0000)
>
> Thanks for that. IS there any animation cancelling with tiamat that i should know, i'd assume there is?

Combos I know of that include tiamat (I'm still pretty bad riven so this isn't all of them)

E Tiamat Q
E Tiamat W
E Tiamat
Tiamat W
Tiamat Q (All three casts)
tiamat E

From my knowledge, your build depends primarily on your match up.

If you know your opponent is going to build armour then you would go straight for {{item:3071}}, if not then {{item:3142}} is preferred.

CDR is your friend, your first item when you back should be {{item:3133}}+{{item:1001}}. [Take CDR glyphs too]

You should also practice some animation cancelling, not particularly the fast combo, but generally to cancel the animations of things like your R to reduce the time in which your opponent can react to your ult. 

For a youtuber one trick pony I reccomend Exil or APriven as their IGN in NA who has created a lot of Riven guides. :P
ok. shouldn't i always be starting {{item:3077}}  first back or not?
Generally you'll want to pick up {{item:3133}} first because of the CDR being an incredible stat for Riven.
nice, and bc for the armor shred

Always go BC first. 

Even if you lose lane hard (like 0/10/0 hard), you NEED a BC to make any realistic impact on fights:
1. A weak Riven has little to no utility in team fights - your execute & knockup are telegraphed, really all you have is a melee-range stun.
2. BC gives your whole team an advantage with it's armor shred, which from memory is applied by your AOE Q.
Ah ok. Will try black cleaver
will definitely check it out. cheers man
